thread.title: Dogecoin Creator Reveals Top 5 Cryptos—XRP Misses the Cut!
thread.title_full: Dogecoin Creator Reveals Top 5 Cryptos—XRP Misses the Cut!

author: Vladimir Popescu
title: Dogecoin Creator Reveals Top 5 Cryptos—XRP Misses the Cut!
text:
Billy Markus, known as Shibetoshi Nakamoto, has shared his dogecoin creator crypto favorites, igniting fresh discussions about top cryptocurrencies in the crypto market. The creator of the meme coin presented his top digital assets, excluding XRP, while spotlighting both established and rising platforms in cryptocurrency investment. His selections have attracted significant attention from traders and investors worldwide.
Also Read: [India’s Upcoming Crypto Laws Could Reshape the Market—Here’s What’s Coming](https://watcher.guru/news/indias-upcoming-crypto-laws-could-reshape-the-market-heres-whats-coming)
Discover the Best Cryptocurrencies According to the Dogecoin Creator
Leading the Pack: Dogecoin and Bitcoin
The list of Dogecoin creator crypto favorites starts with [Dogecoin ](https://coincodex.com/crypto/dogecoin/price-prediction/)– his own creation from 11 years ago.
“It is extremely surreal that some silly thing I made in a few hours has had the impact on the world that it has,” Markus shared on the coin’s anniversary.
Here’s what CoinCodex has to say about the DOGE’s future prices:
”According to our current Dogecoin price prediction, the price of Dogecoin is predicted to drop by -6.04% and reach $ 0.377669 by January 16, 2025. Per our technical indicators, the current sentiment is Neutral while the Fear & Greed Index is showing 83 (Extreme Greed). Dogecoin recorded 17/30 (57%) green days with 5.56% price volatility over the last 30 days. Based on the Dogecoin forecast, it’s now a good time to buy Dogecoin.”
[Bitcoin ](https://coincodex.com/crypto/bitcoin/price-prediction/)takes second place on the list, and it is well known for being the first digital currency. These top cryptocurrencies keep growing stronger, with Bitcoin reaching $106,000. Both coins show the strength of their communities and their impact on digital money.
”According to our current Bitcoin price prediction, the price of Bitcoin is predicted to rise by 11.06% and reach $ 118,628 by January 16, 2025. Per our technical indicators, the current sentiment is Bullish while the Fear & Greed Index is showing 87 (Extreme Greed). Bitcoin recorded 17/30 (57%) green days with 3.45% price volatility over the last 30 days. Based on the Bitcoin forecast, it’s now a good time to buy Bitcoin.”
Also Read: [Shiba Inu: AI Predict SHIB’s Price For December 20](https://watcher.guru/news/shiba-inu-ai-predict-shibs-price-for-december-20)
Innovation and Utility: Avalanche, Ethereum, and Solana
[Avalanche ](https://coincodex.com/crypto/avalanche/price-prediction/)ranks third in the crypto market. Users love its speed and real-world uses. More projects choose this network every day.
”According to our current Avalanche price prediction, the price of Avalanche is predicted to rise by 29.71% and reach $ 63.62 by January 16, 2025. Per our technical indicators, the current sentiment is Neutral while the Fear & Greed Index is showing 87 (Extreme Greed). Avalanche recorded 16/30 (53%) green days with 13.54% price volatility over the last 30 days. Based on the Avalanche forecast, it’s now a good time to buy Avalanche.”
[Ethereum ](https://coincodex.com/crypto/ethereum/price-prediction/)follows next – it’s great for NFTs and smart contracts, but fees stay high. Markus made money with NFTs here.
”According to our current Ethereum price prediction, the price of Ethereum is predicted to rise by 11.81% and reach $ 4,459.76 by January 16, 2025. Per our technical indicators, the current sentiment is Bullish while the Fear & Greed Index is showing 87 (Extreme Greed). Ethereum recorded 15/30 (50%) green days with 7.99% price volatility over the last 30 days. Based on the Ethereum forecast, it’s now a good time to buy Ethereum.”
The cryptocurrency investment chance in [Solana ](https://coincodex.com/crypto/solana/price-prediction/)puts it fifth. Its tech and growing system make it strong. Each network serves different needs.
”According to our current Solana price prediction, the price of Solana is predicted to rise by 10.49% and reach $ 238.59 by January 16, 2025. Per our technical indicators, the current sentiment is Neutral while the Fear & Greed Index is showing 87 (Extreme Greed). Solana recorded 12/30 (40%) green days with 4.42% price volatility over the last 30 days. Based on the Solana forecast, it’s now a good time to buy Solana.”
Notable Exclusions and Market Performance
When asked about leaving XRP off his Dogecoin creator crypto favorites, Markus joked he’d need some first. His list mixes proven top cryptocurrencies with newer ones. Ethereum’s price passed $4,000, proving his good judgment. His picks each bring something special to crypto. Their success in the market backs up his choices as all five grow bigger.
Also Read: [Top 3 Cryptocurrencies That Could Have ETFs in 2025](https://watcher.guru/news/top-3-cryptocurrencies-that-could-have-etfs-in-2025)
Beyond Personal Preferences
Markus trusts cryptocurrency investment more now than regular money. He sees crypto fixing bank problems like high fees and too much control. The crypto market changes as his chosen networks lead the way in technology. Code beats banks because you can test it properly. Recent price jumps show more people agree with him worldwide.
